S

saveMeal() - Method in class classes.EYMS
Saves the current meal to the meals map if the user is a chef, then proceeds to reinitialize the current Meal attribute.
saveOrder() - Method in class classes.EYMS
Saves a non null order in the order map and incrementing the order counter of each meal in it if the current user is a client.
selectMeal(String, int) - Method in class classes.EYMS
Add a quantity of meal to the current order.
setCurrentMeal(Meal) - Method in class classes.EYMS
Ordinary setter
setCurrentOrder(Order) - Method in class classes.EYMS
Ordinary setter
setCurrentUser(User) - Method in class classes.EYMS
Ordinary setter
setDate(String) - Method in class classes.EYMS
Ordinary setter.
showMeal(OrderingCriteria) - Method in class classes.EYMS
Given a certain criteria, returns the meals of meals respecting it.
showMeal() - Method in class classes.EYMS
